item.description:
Come toss eggs, thresh wheat, make cider, and have fun as Agricultural Hall holds it's first Urban Agriculture Fair this Sunday.  Win prizes by bringing your garden produce and kitchen creations for judging by professional agriculturalists and master gardeners.  If you like county fairs, you will love the Urban Agriculture Fair.  See our Google site for fair flyer and entry forms; https://sites.google.com/site/agriculturalhall/home .

If you are a beekeeper with frames of honey to extract, you can use Agricultural Hall's new extractor for free this Sunday during the fair.  Please call Bill at 617-388-7378 to reserve a space.
item.how_to_find_us: Between the Brewery (Ula Cafe, Bella Luna, et al) and the Stony Brook T stop.
item.name: Urban Agriculture Fair & Fun Festival
